title: Caretaker FM, German Ambassador discuss bilateral relations between Pakistan, Germany
content:
ISLAMABAD, Nov 14 (APP): Caretaker Foreign Minister Jalil Abbas Jilani and Ambassador of Germany in Pakistan Alfred Grannas on Tuesday discussed various facets of bilateral relations between the two countries.
During a call on, they agreed to further deepen mutually beneficial cooperation between the two countries, Foreign Office Spokesperson posted on X.
Regional and global developments were also discussed, it was added.
